attributes.action: Limit the pay rise of MP's and Civil Servants to the rate of Inflation on 1st April each year, also that all expenses over £30, be with a reciept. And to give pay rise equal to the same, to all those who work for HMG, Police, Fire Service, Ambulance and Doctors and Nurses working within the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my belief that all those who are paid from the 'public' purse should get the same pay increase, whatever their position. That the pay of MP's should be limited to rise only by inflation. And those who serve in the Police, Fire, Ambulance and NHS, should enjoy, at LEAST the same rise!
